text.title: Drone Omega
text.htmlDescription: A lightweight drone designed for stunning aerial footage. With a high-resolution camera on a 3-axis gimbal and up to 45 minutes of flight time, it's perfect for capturing smooth, stable video. Featuring GPS-assisted hover, obstacle avoidance, and easy portability, the Drone brings innovation and simplicity to your aerial shots.
